name: Peak Rewards for Battery Storage
description: $10 per kWh enrollment bonus plus $0.13 per kWh quarterly for enrolling battery storage in demand response program
fullDescription: San Jose Clean Energy rewards battery storage owners for enrolling in their demand response program, providing both upfront bonuses and ongoing quarterly payments.
whatTheyOffer:
- $10 per kWh enrollment bonus
- $0.13 per kWh quarterly ongoing payment
- Supports grid during peak demand
- Battery discharges during peak events
- Helps prevent outages
- Significant ongoing income from battery
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a San Jose Clean Energy customer
2. Must have eligible battery storage system
3. Enroll battery through program portal
4. Allow battery to connect to program
5. Battery responds during demand events
6. Receive quarterly payments
keywords: SJCE, San Jose Clean Energy, Peak Rewards, battery storage, demand response, quarterly payment, grid support, backup power
